analysis.description:
OLdxrpct (/unique_chucks/25/0xdfdd7d7e58d28a3dd6bf3b730c1f1cd23f35e5c0.sol#98-105) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/25/0xdfdd7d7e58d28a3dd6bf3b730c1f1cd23f35e5c0.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xdfdd7d7e58d28a3dd6bf3b730c1f1cd23f35e5c0.sol:
	Contract MAD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xdfdd7d7e58d28a3dd6bf3b730c1f1cd23f35e5c0.sol#238-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0xdfdd7d7e58d28a3dd6bf3b730c1f1cd23f35e5c0.sol:
